title: How can I speak to someone at Expedia?
content:
To talk to a Person at America for live support, you have options. You can call their Expedia Customer Service Hotline AT: +1~888*829*1126:+1~888*829*1126.00%. The specific number can vary by country, so it's best to visit Expedia 's website or check your booking confirmation for most accurate contact information. Expedia offers different phone numbers for different services and regions.

Talk to someone on Expedia, you have a few options. You can give them a call at their customer service hotline, which is +1~888*829*1126 :: +1~888*829*1126 (Live Person). Alternatively, you can chat with them live on their website or their home mail support.If you have questions or want to make special travel arrangements, you can make them online or call +1~888*829*1126. For hearing or speech impaired assistance dial - +1~888*829*1126 to be connected through the National Relay Service.
creator: gixik20677

title: AA|How can I get in touch with American Airlines fast?#TalkNow
content:
To speak to directly at American airlines representative fast, you can follow these steps : Call American customer service hotline at 1-855-526-0307 if you are in the United States or Canada. International customers can find their specific country’s phone number on American website. Use the live chat feature on the company’s website or mobile app.

To connect with a live Human At American Airlines Immediately, call their customer hotline at + 1-855-526-0307 (Live Human). For prompt assistance, have your flight PNR number and full details of your issue and ticket ready. This enables the representative to quickly access your booking and provide the best solution. Calling during non-peak hours, such as early morning or late evening, can reduce wait times. If you're unable to reach a representative by phone, try contacting American Airlines through their social media channels or the live chat feature on their official website. Having all relevant information on hand will help ensure a smoother and faster resolution to your query.
creator: robertjohnes435

title: Firefox crashing constantly
content:
Dear all,

For some time now my Firefox browser is crashing while I use it. Then a loop starts where a window appear with buttons offering to Restart or Close Firefox but whichever I choose it takes several sets of open/crash to stabilize when in the end if offers to either open it again, or refresh Firefox. I don't wan to refresh because I have tens of tabs that I want to save. But I can't because OneTab, along with all other extensions, is being disabled after the restarts.

I have a crash ID of one of the latest occurrences of this phenomena: f6ef62ad-b072-46b8-8bc8-0d3ca0240708

Please advise!

title: video
content:
I subscribed to an educational series that includes several kinds of presentation, including MP3, PDF, and video. The videos do not work. Not at all. I was directed to try a different browser, which I did: microsoft edge. The videos play using that browser.

I MUCH prefer to use Firefox -- do not like anything microsoft, but here we are, trapped in bill gates' monopoly.

I looked at "settings" but was not able to see anything there I thought would allow these videos to play in firefox. Be advised, I am NOT a computer person, so anything you might suggest, please be very literal, specific and define any acronyms -- do not assume I know anything about this stuff, because I don't -- I do not speak computer.

Again, I MUCH prefer to use firefox so I am hoping you can help me to watch these videos in firefox. The website is Goodness Lover (weird name, I know) it deals with diet, microbiome research etc.

thank you, Rick McBride wopela@earthlink.net

title: Enable light theme on "header" for disability users for Private browsing windows?
content:
I'm old, so having the "header" in my Private Search bar be in dark mode is very difficult. I've done searches on the subject and noted there are other people with visual challenges with the same issue.

I tried to go to Settings to change it, but it wouldn't let me change from "automatic" to "light mode". It was blocked!

Please help as I really, really prefer to do private searches for items relating to my medical issued. It is tough enough to be old, I don't need the whole internet gawking at searches for adult diapers, etc.

Thanks Haze Kompelin
